results.name: Irregular triangle read by rows in which row n lists prime factors (with multiplicity) of the repunit (10^n - 1)/9 (A002275(n)).
comment: See A003020 for other links and references.
link: Ray Chandler, Rows n = 1..322, flattened (first 100 rows from T. D. Noe)
Franz Lemmermeyer, Simerka - Quadratic Forms and Factorization, arXiv:1201.0282 [math.NT], 2011. For the 19-th row = [2071723, 5363222357].
Samuel Yates, The Mystique of Repunits, Math. Mag. 51 (1978), 22-28.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 28 2006
